Package org.turbogwt.mvp.databind.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Binder
    It defines an object that supports binding.
    Binding<T>
    Manager responsible for binding property accessors, validators and formatters to model properties.
    BindingHandler
    An interface that must be implemented by the Presenter supporting databind.
    BindingValidationHandler
    This interface allows the (databind) view to handle the two possible validation events.
    BindingView
    Interface that must be implemented by the View to support databind.
    HasBindingHandler
    Represents a class that holds a handler of binding.
    HasBindingValues
    An object that implements this interface should be a widget with values mapped by String keys, named ids.
    PropertyBinder<T>
    A Binder that supports binding property accessors, validators and formatters to a property id.
    WidgetBinder
    Represents a class capable of binding widgets.
    WidgetBindingStrategy
    Represents a strategy of binding some command execution to a widget event.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BinderRegistration
    A default Registration to be used by Binders.
    BindingImpl<T>
    Manager responsible for binding property accessors, validators and formatters to model properties.
    BindingViewImpl
    BindingView default implementation.
    PresenterEngine<T>
    It is responsible for managing the binding on the Presenter side.
    PresenterEngine.PropertyBinding  
    PresenterEngine.PropertyBindingMap  
    ViewEngine
    It is responsible for managing the binding on the View side.
    ViewEngine.WidgetBinding  
    ViewEngine.WidgetBindingMap  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Strategy
    It is responsible for performing the binding on the widget.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MistypedBindingException
